question.text: For which process will <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>°</mo></math> and <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mo>°</mo></math> are expected to be most similar?

options.text: <math><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

<math><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>.</mo><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

solution.text:
2Al(s)+Fe2O3(s)→2Fe(s)+Al2O3(s)
As in this reaction all reactants and products are in solid states so in this reaction ΔS°≈0 hence ΔG°≈ΔH° .
ΔG=ΔH-TΔS≈ΔH-0≈ΔH
